title: Wix Website Designer (Freelance / Project-Based)
job_overview:
Hi! I’m looking for a creative and reliable Wix website designer to help complete and polish my consultancy website.
The structure is already in place — I just need someone to make it look sleek, professional, and fully functional.

???? You’ll be responsible for:
 • Completing and styling an existing Wix website
 • Creating at least 5 pages: Home, About, Services, Testimonials, Contact/Booking
 • Ensuring the site is mobile-responsive and SEO-friendly
 • Adding a working contact/booking form linked to Upgrade to see actual info
 • Aligning with brand colours/logo
 • Making sure the backend is simple enough for me to update

???? Requirements:
 • Experience designing professional Wix websites
 • Portfolio or samples of past Wix work
 • Good communication and eye for clean, modern design
 • Able to start ASAP and complete within 3–4 weeks

???? Budget: $100–$200 USD (depending on experience and quality)

Please apply by emailing Upgrade to see actual info with:
 1. A short intro about you
 2. Your portfolio or sample links
 3. Your proposed fee
 4. Your availability
